byline.original: By OTTO D. TOLISCHUS By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: heavy fighting reptd at Hjerkinn and Snaasa Lake area
snippet: STOCKHOLM, Sweden April 30-- The battle for the Dombaas-Stoeren railroad line, the Allied key position in the heart of Norway, ended today with a German victory, the full extent of which must still be determined but of whose decisiveness there can...

headline.main: GERMAN UNITS JOIN; Mountains Scaled to Link Oslo and Trondheim in a Furious Advance ALLIES ARE IN DIFFICULTY Large Forces May Be Trapped --Defenders Keep Hold at Namsos, Press at Narvik

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden April 30-- The battle for the Dombaas-Stoeren railroad line, the Allied key position in the heart of Norway, ended today with a German victory, the full extent of which must still be determined but of whose decisiveness there can be no doubt.
